Package edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats

Contains different formatters

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Formatter
    Formatters are used to implement a new format in this application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormatter
    Base class for all Formatters.
    ContentNegotiator
    This class implements content negotiation based on the HTTP accept header field.
    ContentTypeParser
    The ContentTypeParser processes content type string as they are used in Accept and Content-Type HTTP Headers.
    FormatRegistry
    This class is the central registry for output formatters.
    JsonLdFormatter
    JSON-LD Formatter that can be used for JSON-LD Requests.
    JsonLdProfileRegistry
    Central registry for JSON-LD profiles.
    NquadsFormatter
    Formatter implementing N-QUADS
    RdfXmlFormatter
    Formatter implementing RDF/XML
    SimpleFormatter
    This class implements a simple formatter that needs no parsing of additional information in Accept or Content-Type headers and is completely clear with just format and format string info
    TurtleFormatter
    Formatter implementing TURTLE
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Format
    The known formats.

Package edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats Description

Contains different formatters
Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt
